original_text: So this is what the Almighty Lord says: I will make your land become a desert. All the people in the world will be very happy when they see this.
korean_text: 주 여호와께서 이같이 말씀하셨느니라 온 땅이 즐거워할 때에 내가 너를 황폐하게 하되

sentences.original_text: So this is what the Almighty Lord says:
I will make your land become a desert.
All the people in the world
will be very happy when they see this.
sentences.korean_translation: 이것을 볼 때 매우 기쁠 것입니다.
